translations: 伤心事；不幸的事（sorrow 的复数）

sentences.translation: 太多的忧伤使她变得苍老了。

sentences.sentence: What crosses and sorrows happen to us all in this world!
sentences.translation: 在这个世界上，我们每个人都会遇到什么样的苦难和悲伤啊！

sentences.sentence: He tried to get Becky to talk, but her sorrows were too oppressive, all her hopes were gone.
sentences.translation: 他试图让贝基说话，但她的太悲伤了，她所有的希望都破灭了。
